about_the_game:
Mutant College is an adult visual novel based on multiple-choice decisions.

Set in a universe quite similar to our own, where 0.003 percent of the population has experienced an evolutionary leap, there are so-called Mutants, human beings endowed with exceptional and extravagant powers that the scientific community has not yet fully understood all aspects of.

The protagonist discovers late in life that he, too, has this kind of mutation; the Ministry of Mutant Management offers him the opportunity to attend Mutant College, a college where mutants are trained to become the heroes of the world, ready to defend the world from threats and catastrophes.

The protagonist in this fantastic and unexpected adventure will have the opportunity to get to know and form bonds with his fellow college students.

You will gain fame and respect among the superheroes on campus.

Features:

  • 4700 Full HD Images

  • 80 Full HD Animations

  • 135,000 Words

  • Multiple Choices

  • Music & Sound Effects

  • You Can Decide the Name Of the Character

  • Replay gallery

  • Steam Achievements

  • Ren'py Engine

Jean (from the left), Beth, Claire, Denise, and Ella will be your trusted friends right from the start. With them, you’ll share so much. At Mutant College, you’ll have the chance to get to know multiple girls at once and experience great adventures together. The sandbox feature integrated into the game will help you navigate through the campus and the city map.

The college girls won’t be the only ones bringing you thrilling adventures. Professor Katerina Wallet will be more than just a teacher. Lisa Ward, who runs the campus restaurant, might not be entirely faithful to her husband and may even prefer the company of a brilliant student. Psychologist Lucy Carter will need more than a little “special counseling” herself, while mutant scientist Rebecca… well, Rebecca is just Rebecca.

As in any respectable university, Mutant College also has characters of questionable morality. Led by the stunning and powerful Kira Allen, known as Andromeda, we have the Titanium Dragons. These four alluring girls are among the most powerful mutants on campus. Dating them won’t be easy—you’ll first have to prove your worth as a hero. However, once you get to know them better, you’ll realize that beneath their armor of bravado and power lie hidden vulnerabilities, ambitions, and deep desires.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains the following adult content:

- Explicit sex
- Sexual violence
- Abuse of drugs, tobacco and alcohol
- Realistic violence
- Explicit language

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel based or M1 under Rosetta
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Mutant College

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt
Drogen

short_description: In a world where 0.003% of the global population possesses mutant powers, attending a college for superheroes could be the opportunity of a lifetime—will you seize it? Mutant College is an adult visual novel that will immerse you in unique, thrilling, and engaging erotic experiences!
